Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotics family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Enterocin Wbeta was proven to have 3 dehydrated amino acids as well as 2 and 2 Lan and MeLan residues, respectively. The amino acid sequences of the prepeptides of enterocin W showed the highest identity with those of plantaricins Walpha and Wbeta (63.3 and 44.7%, respectively).
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of enterocin W, a novel two-peptide lantibiotic produced by Enterococcus faecalis NKR-4-1.
Literature.Author: Sawa N, Wilaipun P, Kinoshita S, Zendo T, Leelawatcharamas V, Nakayama J, Sonomoto K.
